actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the crude oil windfall profit tax certain interest acquired by institutions of higher education after January 21, 1980.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from application of the crude oil windfall profit tax an economic interest in crude oil acquired after January 21, 1980, by an otherwise tax-exempt institution of higher learning.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to exempt from the crude oil windfall profit tax certain interest acquired by institutions of higher education after January 21, 1980.
